argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | regsumfsum.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |
| 2 |  | regsumfsum.2 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. RR ) |
| 3 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 4 |  | #P_cnfldadd | |- + = ( +g ` CCfld ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( CCfld |`s RR ) = ( CCfld |`s RR ) |
| 6 |  | #P_cnfldex | |- CCfld e. _V |
| 7 | 6 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> CCfld e. _V ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ax-resscn | |- RR C_ CC |
| 9 | 8 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> RR C_ CC ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( k e. A |-> B ) = ( k e. A |-> B ) |
| 11 | 2, 10 | #P_fmptd | |- ( ph -> ( k e. A |-> B ) : A --> RR ) |
| 12 |  | #P_0red | |- ( ph -> 0 e. RR ) |
| 13 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. CC ) -> x e. CC ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_addid2d | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. CC ) -> ( 0 + x ) = x ) |
| 15 | 13 | #P_addid1d | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. CC ) -> ( x + 0 ) = x ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_jca | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. CC ) -> ( ( 0 + x ) = x /\ ( x + 0 ) = x ) ) |
| 17 | 3, 4, 5, 7, 1, 9, 11, 12, 16 | #P_gsumress | |- ( ph -> ( CCfld gsum ( k e. A |-> B ) ) = ( ( CCfld |`s RR ) gsum ( k e. A |-> B ) ) ) |
| 18 | 2 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 19 | 1, 18 | #P_gsumfsum | |- ( ph -> ( CCfld gsum ( k e. A |-> B ) ) = sum_ k e. A B ) |
| 20 | 17, 19 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ph -> ( ( CCfld |`s RR ) gsum ( k e. A |-> B ) ) = sum_ k e. A B ) |
